xc.name: Mr. Whiskers
xc.appearance: Black cat with glowing green eyes
xc.clothing: Red collar with a golden bell

json_to_edit.voice_over: Be careful what you wish for, especially when ancient magic is involved.
json_to_edit.description: Emily makes a wish at the old wishing well, unleashing unexpected consequences.
json_to_edit.location: Ancient wishing well in a secluded forest clearing
json_to_edit.weather: Partly cloudy with a mystical breeze
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Rustling leaves, distant bird calls, trickling water
json_to_edit.name: The Wishing Well's Whimsy
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Emily's innocent wish at an ancient well leads to magical chaos affecting her friends and surroundings.

qa.action: Emily approaches the moss-covered wishing well in a sun-dappled forest clearing.

hf.action: Emily's hand drops a coin into the well, her eyes closed in concentration.

tr.sfx_keywords: sudden gust of wind, magical tinkling
tr.action: A swirl of glowing mist rises from the well, enveloping Emily.

xc.action: The mist expands, reaching Jack and Grandma Rose who are watching from nearby.

ka.action: Mr. Whiskers' eyes glow brighter as he observes the unfolding magic.

fn.action: Jack's glasses turn into butterflies and flutter away.

af.action: Grandma Rose's shawl comes to life, floating and dancing around her.

qo.action: Emily's red curls transform into blooming flowers.

fp.action: The clearing is now full of whimsical, magically altered objects and surprised characters.

edit_command: Rearrange the order of shots to: 5, 2, 8, 1, 7, 3, 9, 4, 6. Don't change anything else.

label.rationale: we will rearrange the order of shots as requested by the director. this involves updating the "list_display_order" field in the "shots" object to reflect the new order. we'll map the new order to the corresponding shot keys and update the string accordingly. the content of each shot will remain unchanged, we're only altering their order of appearance.
